categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ges-Su-Kai was a Jedi Master of the Jedi Order living during the Cold War.

Master Ges-Su-Kai is only mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic in a letter that he sends to Consular characters if the player picks the dark side option at the end of the Tatooine class mission. If that happens, Master Syo Bakarn assigns Ges-Su-Kai to investigate Eriz Vossan's research about the primary successful traits of the Sand People culture. In the light side option, the research is destroyed instead.
